14.1.hd_quote: It does have this power for direction, but that does not mean that it knows what to do with it.
14.1.behavioral_axis: Protects their sacral power as currency for the right direction, waiting for the pulse that signals when to empower rather than force.
14.1.shadow_axis: Throws energy at wrong directions or gives power to others hoping they'll provide direction, making attempts at things not for them.
14.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

14.2.hd_quote: The key to power lies in not trying to be and do everything alone.
14.2.behavioral_axis: Projects natural power outward as individual difference, called out by others to delegate responsibility and invest in expertise rather than doing everything alone.
14.2.shadow_axis: Insists on being their own expert in everything, projecting big talk about direction without the capacity to get there alone.
14.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

14.3.hd_quote: They will offer their energy to different drivers until they have the experience to recognize which driver can really be good for them.
14.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with offering sacral energy to different causes through trial-and-error, learning which directions truly serve the highest good.
14.3.shadow_axis: Hoards energy through greed, refusing to release power to any cause until finding the perfect one, becoming condemned for their retention.
14.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

14.4.hd_quote: The key to power lies in developing skills to ensure a strong foundation.
14.4.behavioral_axis: Fixes sacral power in one focused direction, externalizing their energy commitment to develop skills that ensure a strong foundation.
14.4.shadow_axis: Fixates overconfidently in one direction, leaving themselves exposed and easily manipulated from angles they haven't secured or anticipated.
14.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

14.5.hd_quote: When you meet a 14.5, you assume that they are powerful.
14.5.behavioral_axis: Holds steady under the projection field where others assume they have power, maintaining innate dignity against the risk inherent in projected positions.
14.5.shadow_axis: Judges and dismisses the drivers others provide, expressing dissatisfaction and superiority when the direction doesn't match their projected power.
14.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

14.6.hd_quote: It is the existential good luck of being in the right place at the right time.
14.6.behavioral_axis: Stands back with humility and objectivity, treating power as existential gift while waiting for divine timing or serendipity to reveal the perfect direction.
14.6.shadow_axis: Rarely commits energy to anything, withdrawing from opportunities unless absolutely certain the driver will take them where they need to go.
14.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
